description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=2/3. Only 80 MS Points. Behold, a wild 3D RPG Adventure awaits! Explore a Massive castle with Hundred of rooms, Secret passages, over 35 NPC's, Scary creatures to Kill, and mechanical Puzzles to solve.  Play online multiplayer or 25 hour single player campaign. Full Inventory. Numerous Shops. 50 Advancing Levels. Rage Quitting fully Supported.*
